name: Clock Caper
description:
Please allow a few seconds for the game to load.

Play The Pocket-Watch Prince in Clock Caper!

In this old-timey romp, you need to appease the mean old Grandfather Clock by matching the correct time every 10 seconds. Watch out! He’ll throw everything at his disposal to stop you from accomplishing your task!

Controls:

WASD/Arrow Keys to Move Space to Jump

Push the red clock hand into the blue target zone every 10 seconds to survive!

For an extra challenge, turn on Hard Mode in the menu. Time will speed up every 5 matches.
